means: 克什米尔（南亚一地区，约2/5弱为巴基斯坦控制，其余为印度控制）

sentence.Network_en: Washington and Moscow are believed to have similar views on Kashmir.
sentence.Network_cn: 据信华盛顿和莫斯科在克什米尔问题上的看法相似。

sentence.Network_en: They have been trying to internationalise the Kashmir problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们一直想使克什米尔问题国际化。

sentence.Network_en: The plebiscite in Kashmir desired by the U . N . has never taken place.
sentence.Network_cn: 联合国要求的克什米尔公民投票一直未能实现.

PerfectNetExp.abs: hence barack obama' s proposal , on the presidential campaign trail , to appoint a special envoy to kashmir .因此巴拉克奥巴马（barackobama）在总统竞选活动期间提议，向克什米尔地区委派一名特使。

list.abs: anger at these claims helped spread protests across the kashmir valley , leading to 11 deaths and several days of curfews and bandhs ( politically inspired strikes ) that crippled business and closed schools .出于对警方声明的愤怒，这次抗议活动很快蔓延了整个克什米尔谷地，导致了11人死亡和为期数天的宵
kashan rug 卡香波斯地毯kashmir coat wool 低质印度羊毛Kashmir rug 克什米尔地毯
...奶茶都是热的,我的食谱有加姜,但在印度只在北北印的喀什米尔邦(kashmir state)有尝过加了姜的奶茶.奶茶香料粉(tea masala)在印度.

means.word_mean: 1. an area in southwestern Asia whose sovereignty is disputed between Pakistan and India
